content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the GV English website. The website offers General English, English for Academic Purposes, Business English, and English Exam Preparation courses in both Calgary and Victoria, Canada. They also offer Private English Lessons and Pathway programs, as well as test centers for the Celpip and IELTS exams and services such as a Free English Level Check and Visa & Immigration assistance. Accommodations and activities are also provided. In addition, I received a command to browse the IALC website, which stands for International Association of Language Centres.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The IALC is an organization that accredits language schools worldwide, sets quality standards, and provides resources for students and agents. They have over 139 accredited year-round and summer centres in 120 destinations, offering courses in 10 languages. They also organize events and workshops for their members. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.ialc.org/)', 'Favourites (https://www.ialc.org/favourites/)', 'Resources (https://www.ialc.org/resources/)', 'About us (https://www.ialc.org/about-us/)', 'About us (https://www.ialc.org/about-us/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.ef.com/", "question": "What language courses does EF offer?"}}}'}]
"""
